physical_appearance:This is an altar cloth. It is embroided with depictions of the figures of deities
 against a background of gold thread. The faces of the figures are painted on paper and attached to the altar cloth. The top panel features a pair of phoenixes flanking a lotus bloom flower.

 of happiness
 status and longevity
 are embroidered on this altar cloth
 against a background of gold thread. The faces
 including that of the two attendant figures seem to have been painted on paper and attached to the fabric. The top panel features a pair of phoenix flanking a lotus bloom. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
